864f7272-1138-4480-9cc3-bfa21209c7dc.name: Frequency: Constantly
864f7272-1138-4480-9cc3-bfa21209c7dc.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

63db2da8-3fc3-468c-afd6-10495ca1ff08.name: Frequency: Hourly
63db2da8-3fc3-468c-afd6-10495ca1ff08.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

71b5ef3e-1214-4d32-942b-2d6e36f9f01b.name: Frequency: Daily
71b5ef3e-1214-4d32-942b-2d6e36f9f01b.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

22283ddc-2042-426b-bfd8-99822de89987.name: Frequency: Weekly
22283ddc-2042-426b-bfd8-99822de89987.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

f6826d1c-f88e-49bf-bf22-0a459b924a4f.name: Frequency: Monthly
f6826d1c-f88e-49bf-bf22-0a459b924a4f.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

5e89293e-6a85-4790-b043-146c692edc45.name: Frequency: Seasonally
5e89293e-6a85-4790-b043-146c692edc45.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

9cc9627d-702a-4bee-b81d-d13e41740ea2.name: Frequency: Yearly
9cc9627d-702a-4bee-b81d-d13e41740ea2.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

eac3aa73-51d6-43a5-aae8-e1c100747a96.name: Aging
eac3aa73-51d6-43a5-aae8-e1c100747a96.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

fff63b56-1cb4-4292-b06e-549bf77ebd2b.name: Social Stigma (Minority Group)
fff63b56-1cb4-4292-b06e-549bf77ebd2b.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group
